<div class="column" style="width:48%">

::: {.r-stack}

::: {.fragment .fade-in-then-out fragment-index=0}

<ul>
  <li>Utilize a causal transformer to learn trajectory representations.</li>
  <li>Can learn them for each joint.</li>
  <li>Use these representations as feature vectors of a subsequent GNN.</li>
</ul>
